mapper.select: select id,mc,lj,jb,px,sjId from cai_dan where jb=1
select id,mc,lj,jb,px,sjId from cai_dan where sjId=#{0} order by px
mapper.insert:
insert into ding_dan
wybm,
ddh,
ddztId,
bjsj,
jhysrq,
yzxzl,
sjzl,
lxlx,
yssId,
wlxxId,
fhdwId,
shdwId,
cyclId,
cysjId,
xdyhId,
bz,
values
#{wybm},
#{ddh},
#{ddztId},
now(),
#{jhysrq},
#{yzxzl},
#{sjzl},
#{lxlx},
#{yssId},
#{wlxxId},
#{fhdwId},
#{shdwId},
#{cyclId},
#{cysjId},
#{xdyhId},
#{bz},
mapper.update:
update ding_dan set
jhysrq=#{jhysrq},
crksj=#{crksj},
yzxzl=#{yzxzl},
lxlx=#{lxlx},
ddztId=#{ddztId},
rkzt=#{rkzt},
sjzl=#{sjzl},
yssId=#{yssId},
wlxxId=#{wlxxId},
fhdwId=#{fhdwId},
shdwId=#{shdwId},
cyclId=#{cyclId},
cysjId=#{cysjId},
where wybm=#{wybm}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ding_dan dd left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId in (#{ddztId})
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq=#{jhysrq}
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yss},'%')

select dd.wybm,dd.ddh,cl.cph,yss.id yssId,yss.mc yssmc,dd.wlxxId wlxxId,dd.fhdwId fhdwId,dd.shdwId shdwId,dd.cyclId cyclId,dd.cysjId cysjId,dd.lxlx,dd.jhysrq,ddzt.mc ddztmc,dd.yzxzl,dd.sjzl,dd.zlceb,dd.crksj from ding_dan dd left join che_liang cl on dd.cyclId=cl.id left join yun_shu_shang yss on dd.yssId=yss.id left join ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt on dd.ddztId=ddzt.id where 1=1
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId in (#{ddztId})
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')
and dd.jhysrq=#{jhysrq}
and yss.mc like CONCAT('%',#{yss},'%')
order by dd.bjsj desc limit #{rowNum},#{rows}
select * from ding_dan_zhuang_tai
mapper.insert:
insert into zhi_jian_bao_gao
jl,
bjsj,
glddBm,
values
#{jl},
now(),
#{glddBm},
mapper.update:
update zhi_jian_bao_gao set
jl=#{jl},
bjsj=now()
where glddBm=#{glddBm}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from zhi_jian_bao_gao zjbg,ding_dan dd,ding_dan_zhuang_tai ddzt,che_liang cl where zjbg.glddBm=dd.wybm and ddzt.id=dd.ddztId and dd.cyclId=cl.id
and zjbg.jl=#{jl}
and dd.ddh like CONCAT('%',#{ddh},'%')
and dd.ddztId in (#{ddztId})
and cl.cph like CONCAT('%',#{cph},'%')

and gb.gbsj between #{gbsjs} and #{gbsje}

update che_liang set
sfzy=1,shzt=2
sfzy=0,shzt=3
where 1=1
#{id}

update si_ji set
zyzt=1,shzt=3
zyzt=0,shzt=1
where 1=1
#{id}

cph=#{cph},
czxx=#{czxx},

and zyzt=#{zyzt}
and shzt in(#{shzt})
